alert.note: Alert for Bland; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Tazewell, western Bland and southwestern Mercer Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tiptop, or 7 miles northeast of Tazewell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluefield... Tazewell... Ceres... Burkes Garden... Pocahontas... Bramwell... and Clear Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Virginia...and southeastern West Virginia.
